text: Sir Edward Michael Coulson Fowler (19 December 1929 â€“ 12 July 2022) was a New Zealand architect, writer and politician. He was the mayor of Wellington from 1974 to 1983. Fowler was born in Marton, New Zealand. He was a member of the National Party. Fowler died on 12 July 2022 in Wellington, New Zealand from COVID-19 at the age of 92. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2022 deaths Category:New Zealand politicians Category:People from Wellington Category:New Zealand writers Category:New Zealand architects Category:New Zealand mayors Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in New Zealand
title: Michael Fowler
